description: Creates a postgres Aurora RDS database instance

instance_class.description: This is the RDS instance type used for the Aurora cluster [instances](https://aws.amazon.com/rds/instance-types/).

engine_version.description: The version of the database to use.

backup_retention_days.description: How many days to keep the backup retention

multi_az.description: Enable read-write replication across different availability zones on the same reason (doubles the cost, but needed for compliance). Can be added and updated at a later date without need to recreate.

safety.description: Add deletion protection to stop accidental db deletions

db_name.description: The name of the database to create. Follow naming conventions [here](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/CHAP_Limits.html#RDS_Limits.Constraints)
